price: (8) Allāh knows what every female carries[629] and what the wombs lose [prematurely] or exceed.[630] And everything with Him is by due measure.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تَحۡمِلُ كُلُّ أُنثَىٰ وَمَا تَغِيضُ ٱلۡأَرۡحَامُ وَمَا تَزۡدَادُۚ وَكُلُّ شَيۡءٍ عِندَهُۥ بِمِقۡدَارٍ
footnotes:
[629]- With absolute knowledge inclusive of every aspect of the fetus' existence.
[630]- Beyond their normal period of pregnancy and/or the number of fetuses therein.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yaʿlamu mā taḥmilu kullu unthā wamā taghīḍu al-arḥāmu wamā tazdādu wakullu shayin ʿindahu bimiq'dārin
